short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject custom DuckDuckGo Bangs into your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Fangs you can add your own DuckDuckGo-style Bangs with ease. Want to add a website not supported by DuckDuckGo, or override an existing Bang with your own? This WebExtension lets you do that.

Head to the options page by clicking on the extension icon, then add your own custom Bangs and use them like you would normally.
